description: Web Search Tool that performs web searches and returns results without opening a browser.

action.description: The action to perform. Supported actions are 'open' and 'search'. Defaults to 'search'.

url.description: The URL to open or fetch content from. Required for 'open' action.

searchQuery.description: The query string to search for. Required for 'search' action.

resultsCount.description: The number of search results to return. Defaults to 5.
